title: Cumulative Cases of Ebola
notes: It includes probable, confirmed and suspected cases

title: Cumulative Deaths from Ebola
notes: It includes probable, confirmed and suspected cases

title: People Receiving Food Aid
notes: Data refers to people receiving food in Sierra Leone, Liberia and Guinea only

title: Currently Affected Countries
notes: Countries with an active EVD outbreak are Guinea, Liberia, Mali, Sierra Leone, Spain and the United States of America. Previously affected countries Nigeria and Senegal are not included as they have been declared ebola free by the WHO.
